content: The GOP brass wants to repeal Obamacare because it will cut taxes to the wealthiest 1% — so what, they say, if 25 million people lose their health coverage. The Goobers who voted for tRump because they wanted Obamacare repealed had NO IDEA it was being repealed so that the richest of the rich could get richer on the backs of those who are losing their health care. Hey Goobers — no sympathy. You built this. No eat it.
